text: Supah Ninjas is an American action superhero teen sitcom. It was created by Leo Chu and Eric Garcia. It aired on Nickelodeon from January 17, 2011 to April 27, 2013. It ran for 2 seasons. It follows Mike Fukanaga and his friends, Owen and Amanda. After his grandfather's death, Mike receives a mysterious letter that leads him to discover that he comes from a long line of vigilante ninjas. title: Supah Ninjas
